Wikimedia list article

Actor, director, producer, and screenwriter Tom Hanks has been honored with numerous awards and nominations, including two consecutive Academy Awards for Best Actor for Philadelphia (1993) and Forrest Gump (1994). Tom Hanks has won a total of 50 awards on this list.
